name: Covid Survival
description:
Covid Survival is a single player action-survival game inspired by the game "Genshin Impact".

  • Goal: Survive as long as possible
  • Viruses will continuously spawn and attack the character
  • Collect experience points and artifacts
  • Level up and learn/upgrade skills
  • Difficulty will scale as time passes

WARNING: Game is intended/recommended to play on android! 

Controls for Desktop/Web:

  • Arrow keys for movement

Developed by: Barbara Fan Club

Members: Samuel Mark Dy Reyes, Christian Dia (aid888), Josef Papillera
